taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Columbia (River), and doria , an early name for goldenrods]

bio:treatment.discussion: Possibly, Columbiadoria is a member of the Petradoria group (Solidagininae), although it lacks the characteristic linear-lanceolate, parallel-nerveed leaves of those species (G. L. Nesom 1991f).

references.reference: Nesom, G. L. 1991f. Redefinition of Hesperodoria (Asteraceae: Astereae) and the segregation of Columbiadoria, a new monotypic genus from the western United States. Phytologia 71: 244â€“251.
